title: SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket set to launch Egyptian communications satellite
summary: SpaceX says a Falcon 9 rocket is on track to launch Egypt’s Nilesat 301 communications satellite no earlier than (NET) 5:04 pm...

title: Xona to test GPS-alternative demo satellite with customer
summary: Startup Xona Space Systems is preparing to demonstrate services from a test satellite to the first major customer for its planned navigation constellation.

title: NASA to Inflate Heat Shield on Earth Before Spaceflight Demo
summary: NASA is inviting media to see a technology that could one day help land humans on Mars after it is inflated for the final time on Earth before its spaceflight demonstration later this year.

title: Globalstar spare satellite to launch on SpaceX rocket this month
summary: A spare satellite for Globalstar’s data relay and messaging constellation will launch from Cape Canaveral on a Falcon 9 rocket later this month, multiple sources said, in a previously-undisclosed mission on SpaceX’s schedule.

title: Redwire, MDA, to produce tactical communications antennas for military satellites
summary: Redwire announced June 7 it won a contract to produce 42 tactical communications antennas for U.S. military satellites in low Earth orbit.
